summary: JEEP 2002 LIBERTY SPORT 4WD WHEN MAKING RIGHT HAND TURN IN 2WD OR 4WD  WHEELS BIND/ TURN  ANDCAR STOPS DEAD IN TRACKS, SOMETIMES HEAR THUMPING OR METAL SOUND. ACTS LIKE A INTERMITTENT TRANSFER CASE PROBLEM...CAR IS IN 2WD MOST OF THE TIME..SHARP RIGHT TURN WELL WITH-IN TURNING RADIUS OF JEEP...NORMAL DRIVING! *AK
